UniqueID.description: The unique ID of the mod this content pack is for.

MinimumVersion.description: The minimum version of the mod this content pack is for. If the player doesn't have the minimum version, SMAPI will show an error message.

dllFile.description: Relative path to a DLL file.

Name.description: The mod name. SMAPI uses this in player messages, logs, and errors.

Author.description: The name of the person who created the mod. Ideally this should include the username used to publish mods.

Version.description: The mod's semantic version. Make sure you update this for each release! SMAPI uses this for update checks, mod dependencies, and compatibility blacklists (if the mod breaks in a future version of the game).

Description.description: A short explanation of what your mod does (one or two sentences), shown in the SMAPI log.

UniqueID.description: A unique identifier for your mod. The recommended format is <your name>.<mod name>, with no spaces or special characters.

EntryDll.description: The mod's compiled DLL filename in its mod folder.

ContentPackFor.description: The unique ID of the mod this content pack is for.

MinimumApiVersion.description: The minimum SMAPI version required to run this mod. If the player doesn't have the minimum version, SMAPI will show an error message.

Dependencies.description: A list of mods this mod depends on. SMAPI will show an error message if the player doesn't have the required mods installed.

UpdateKeys.description: A list of update keys for this mod. SMAPI uses these to check for updates.
